name: Strength
description: Physical power, athletic ability, and raw force. In personality mapping, represents forcefulness, physical presence, and willingness to use direct power.
low_score_traits: relies on others for physical tasks

name: Dexterity
description: Agility, reflexes, and fine motor skills. In personality mapping, represents quick thinking, adaptability, and grace under pressure.
high_score_traits: dodges problems rather than confronting them head-on
real_world_indicators: good at thinking on their feet

name: Constitution
description: Endurance, stamina, and vital force. In personality mapping, represents resilience, perseverance, and ability to withstand hardship.
high_score_traits: rarely gets sick or burnt out

name: Intelligence
description: Mental acuity, information recall, and analytical ability. In personality mapping, represents learning capacity, logical thinking, and knowledge acquisition.

name: Wisdom
description: Perception, insight, and judgment. In personality mapping, represents emotional intelligence, intuition, common sense, and the ability to read people and situations.
low_score_traits: book smart but not street smart
real_world_indicators: people come to them for advice

name: Charisma
description: Force of personality, social influence, and persuasiveness. In personality mapping, represents leadership, charm, intimidation, or any form of personal magnetism.
low_score_traits: lets others take the lead socially
